EmailTemplate.name: Global_Event_Velocity_Q415.Follow up Email
EmailTemplate.subject: Thank You for Joining Pivotal at Velocity New York 2015
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello{{lead.First Name:default=edit me}},
Thank you for visiting Pivotal at Velocity! We hope you enjoyed learning about the our comprehensive cloud native platform for building your future.
In case you missed anything, we have made it easy for you to find related material to begin your cloud native journey.
- If you would like a free copy of Matt Stine’s book on Migrating to Cloud Native Applications you can download a copy <http://pivotal.io/platform/migrating-to-cloud-native-application-architectures-ebook> today. - Sign-up for a hands-on workshop <http://pivotal.io/cloud-native-workshop> in your area. - Michael Coté and Andrew Clay Shafer talk about That Cloud Native Lifestyle <http://blog.pivotal.io/pivotal-conversations/features/that-cloud-native-lifestyle> via Pivotal Conversations podcasts - Sign up for two months of free Pivotal Web Services <http://try.run.pivotal.io/DevOpsDaysAustin?utm_source=landingpage&utm_medium=langingpagetext&utm_term=FreePWS&utm_campaign=DevOpsDaysAustin>, giving you access to Pivotal Cloud Foundry without having to install and manage it yourself.
Stay in touch with Pivotal and join the conversation on our blogs <http://blog.pivotal.io/cloud-foundry-pivotal>, podcasts <http://blog.pivotal.io/podcasts-pivotal>, and on Twitter <https://twitter.com/pivotalcf/>.
We hope to see you again soon at a future event <https://pivotal.io/news-events>!
Thank you, The Pivotal Team
